I created this acc just to tell u guys what i did to finally work the game. 

1st problem: Crash on loading screen
For this problem, i updated my graphics card and changed the vertical sync under the 3D settings to off.

2nd problem: Buy mode invisible
For this problem, I used the sims 3 ultimate fix.

(http://games4theworld.bestgoo.com/t752-the-sims-3-ultimate-fix-should-fix-most-of-your-problems)

It also solves the problem with "installed a non-oficial modification in my game"

I advice applying the ultimate fix b4 changing the graphic card settings 

Hope it helps.

And now, it tells me that the launcher doesn't respond either. -sighs- I'm already frustrated with this game, as I waited a week for it and now I can't even play it >< How do I fix this, before I stop seeding it and uninstall it off my comp?

Step 1 - READ THIS (EVERYTHING) before installing http://games4theworld.bestgoo.com/t1171-must-read-how-to-install-the-sims-3-correctly

Step 2 - After installing base game, open launcher and update manually and close launcher before installing next expansion. Do this for every expansion until PET'S expansion.

Step 3 - DO NOT USE THE CRACK in furikazashi's folder after installing all expansion. FOLLOW the instruction in STEP'S 1 website! Game Key Codes can be used just not the CRACKS in furikazashi FOLDER!

If you have done this steps correctly you will have no problem or whatsoever crash and shit going on in game. And if everything is done correctly and you want to mod please refer to this website  http://www.modthesims.info/wiki.php?title=Game_Help:Installing_Sims_3_Package_Files/Setup_and_Files

Goodluck installing!
